## Brief Summary

A brief but memorable vacation.

## Miscellaneous Notes

-   Travel dates: 2025-04-01 - 2025-04-08

-   Hotel: Romer House Waikiki

-   Car Rental: None

-   Transportation: On foot and HOLO card on TheBus or at a Skyline station.
